articles.title: Federal judge rules Texas school mask ban violates Americans with Disabilities Act - CNN
articles.description: A federal judge has ruled that Texas' ban on mask mandates in schools violates the Americans with Disabilities Act, according to court documents filed Wednesday in US District Court for the Western District of Texas.
